description: Binomial transform of Thue-Morse sequence A010060.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: a(n) = sum(A010060(k) * A007318(n,k) : 0 <= k <= n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 07 2014
mathematica: tm[0] = 0; tm[n_?EvenQ] := tm[n] = tm[n/2]; tm[n_] := tm[n] = 1-tm[(n-1)/2]; a[n_] := Sum[tm[k]*Binomial[n, k], {k, 0, n}]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 40}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Jun 30 2015 *)
prog: (Haskell)a019302 = sum . zipWith (*) a010060_list . a007318_row-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 07 2014
author: _Jonas Wallgren_
